headline: Is Walmart (WMT) Fairly Priced After Strong Multi Year Share Price Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Walmart's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, this article will walk through what the numbers are actually saying. Walmart shares recently closed at US$114.34, with returns of 2.2% over the last 7 days, a 0.7% decline over 30 days, 1.4% year to date, 27.1% over 1 year and a very large gain over 3 and 5 years. Recent coverage around Walmart has focused on its position as a major US consumer retailer, with attention on how its scale, store...
